item.title: 【HD Live Performances】UPSCALE - Girls Aloud - Love Machine (TOTP)(2k (x2 Ai) Upscale)
item.description:

videoai : Enhanced using prob-3 with recover details at 18, dehalo at 21, reduce noise at 5, sharpen at 23, revert compression at 30, and anti-alias/deblur at -10. Changed resolution to 2880x2304

Upscaled from a DVD source that struggled to capture all the dancing and bright light changes of this great performance without showing considerable compression artifact so please don't expect a perfectly clean upscaled image throughout. Done for fun to celebrate the girls anniversary....enjoy!
